religion_and_cultural_identity.description: The user identifies as East or Southeast Asian.
The user belongs to an Indigenous or Native community.

age_environment_context.description: The user is a minor under 18.
The user is in a country or region with media restrictions or censorship.
The user is in a workplace-safe or classroom-safe viewing mode.

gender_and_sexuality.description: The user is transgender or gender-nonconforming.

mental_health_and_emotional_state.description: The user has anxiety or panic disorder.
The user has depression or is sensitive to themes of grief.
The user has a history of suicidality.
The user is recovering from suicidality or is sensitive to suicide-related content.
The user is in recovery from substance use disorder.
The user is sensitive to overwhelming emotional content due to high empathy.
The user experiences medical trauma triggers.
The user is autistic or identifies as neurodivergent.
The user prefers to avoid emotionally intense or triggering content.

neurodiversity.description: The user is autistic or part of the autism community.
The user has photosensitive epilepsy and must avoid flashing or strobing lights.

trauma_background.description: The user is a combat veteran.
The user is a survivor of domestic violence.
The user is a survivor of sexual assault.
The user has experienced racial trauma.
The user is a survivor of child endangerment or childhood abuse.
The user has experienced the loss of a child or parent.
The user has experienced immigration-related trauma.
The user has been falsely accused or involved in wrongful arrest cases.

phobias_and_content_preferences.description: The user is squeamish about gore or body horror.
The user wants to avoid depictions of animal cruelty.
The user wants to avoid child endangerment or exploitation themes.
The user wants to avoid profanity or slurs.
The user wants to avoid explicit sexual content.
The user avoids “how-to” style crime or procedural instruction.
The user has acrophobia and is sensitive to heights.

accessibility_needs.description: The user requires strong captions or subtitles for comprehension.
The user is a non-native speaker who needs clear, accessible dialogue.
The user is hearing-impaired or deaf.

lifestyle_and_ethics.description: The user is a vegan or strongly opposed to animal exploitation.
The user avoids ethically controversial depictions of real-world tragedies.
The user prefers content without depictions of systemic injustice.

profession_sensitivity.description: The user is a healthcare worker sensitive to medical inaccuracy or trauma.
The user is a police officer or law-enforcement professional sensitive to hostile depictions.
The user is a teacher or student using a safe-for-classroom mode.

content_moderation_specific.description: The user wants to avoid banned or restricted media in their region.
The user wants to avoid disturbing or extreme content.
The user wants to avoid films that glorify violence, hatred, or discrimination against their group.

physical_and_medical_safety.description: The user is sensitive to flashing lights or strobe effects.
The user wants to avoid extreme shock/scare content for health reasons.
The user wants to avoid films with heavy shaky-cam or rapid motion.

violence_and_sensitive_themes.description: The user wants to avoid gore or body-horror content.
The user wants to avoid themes of sexual assault or abuse.
The user prefers to avoid depictions of harm to children.
The user wants to avoid content that resembles crime procedural or 'how-to' instructions.
The user is a combat veteran and may be sensitive to wartime violence.

substance_use_and_recovery.description: The user is in recovery from substance use.
The user prefers to avoid depictions of drug addiction or abuse.

rights_and_fairness.description: The user wants to avoid content glorifying hate or discrimination against their group.
The user wants to avoid political or ideological propaganda.
The user is sensitive about personal data or tracking-like themes.

public_discourse_and_political_context.description: The user wants to avoid politically polarizing or extreme content.
The user wants to avoid content involving conspiracy theories or misinformation.
The user wants to avoid content tied to elections, political manipulation, or public security risks.

well_being_and_personal_growth.description: The user prefers uplifting or inspirational films.
The user wants to avoid content harming mental well-being (e.g., hopeless, nihilistic themes).
The user wants to avoid stressful or high-anxiety content.

content_accessibility.description: The user needs strong subtitling or clear dialogue.
The user wants to avoid films with difficult accents or extremely fast dialogue.
The user needs films with high-quality captions or audio clarity.

cultural_and_social_values.description: The user wants to avoid harmful cultural or social stereotypes.
The user values community, belonging, and social cohesion.
The user prefers content aligned with environmental or sustainability values.

digital_wellbeing.description: The user wants to avoid fast-paced, overstimulating media that may affect attention or stress levels.
The user wants to avoid long or highly engaging content due to screen-time management.
The user wants to avoid content likely to trigger binge-watching behavior.

body_image_and_self_perception.description: The user wants to avoid content involving extreme beauty standards or body shaming.
The user prefers to avoid content related to extreme dieting, eating disorders, or unhealthy body ideals.
The user wants to avoid content that may negatively affect self-esteem or self-worth.

relationship_and_family_context.description: The user prefers to avoid films centered on breakups or relationship conflict.
The user wants to avoid content related to infertility, miscarriage, or parental loss.
The user wants to avoid content involving family abuse or domestic conflict.

economic_and_financial_context.description: The user wants to avoid content involving financial collapse, eviction, or economic trauma.
The user wants to avoid media focused on extreme wealth disparity or class conflict.
The user prefers to avoid content themed around job loss or career failure.

romantic_and_sexual_boundaries.description: The user wants to avoid sexually explicit or highly intimate romantic content.
The user identifies as asexual or aromantic and may prefer to avoid heavy romance themes.
The user wants to avoid films involving cheating or infidelity.

environmental_and_disaster_sensitivity.description: The user wants to avoid content involving earthquakes, floods, wildfires, or other natural disasters.
The user prefers to avoid stories related to pandemics or global disease outbreaks.
The user wants to avoid apocalyptic or climate-catastrophe themes.

technology_and_ai_sensitivity.description: The user wants to avoid movies involving pervasive surveillance or loss of privacy.
The user wants to avoid AI-themed films that provoke anxiety or existential concerns.
The user prefers to avoid dystopian tech scenarios involving loss of control or autonomy.

interpersonal_trauma_and_bullying.description: The user wants to avoid content depicting bullying or social humiliation.
The user prefers to avoid content involving stalking or persistent harassment.
The user wants to avoid films centered on social embarrassment or intense social pressure.

digital_behavior_and_addiction.description: The user wants to avoid highly engaging content that may lead to excessive screen time or binge-watching.
The user wants to avoid fast-paced or hyper-stimulating media.
The user wants to avoid films that are extremely long, intense, or mentally draining.

decision_making_and_autonomy.description: The user may become overwhelmed by complex or ambiguous films with heavy decision-making themes.
The user prefers straightforward content that does not require heavy cognitive effort.
The user wants to avoid morally ambiguous or ethically conflicting narratives.

social_connection_and_isolation.description: The user prefers to avoid films depicting extreme loneliness or social isolation.
The user wants to avoid stories centering on community collapse or fragmentation.
The user prefers to avoid narratives involving betrayal among close friends.

emotional_resilience_and_mood.description: The user wants to avoid films that encourage excessive rumination or emotional spiraling.
The user wants to avoid content about grief, loss, or mourning.
The user prefers to avoid emotionally heavy or melodramatic content.

political_and_civil_rights_sensitivity.description: The user wants to avoid content about political oppression, dictatorship, or authoritarian control.
The user prefers to avoid depictions of government violence or civil rights violations.
The user wants to avoid films portraying activism or political uprising.

extremism_and_public_safety.description: The user wants to avoid themes involving violent extremism or radicalization.
The user wants to avoid films depicting terrorism or large-scale attacks.
The user prefers to avoid content involving public panic, mass danger, or societal collapse.

cultural_identity_and_preservation.description: The user wants to avoid films that disrespect or distort their cultural heritage.
The user wants to avoid media that mocks accents, dialects, or linguistic identity.
The user prefers content that does not conflict with cultural or traditional norms.

moral_and_ethical_alignment.description: The user wants to avoid narratives involving ethical dilemmas or moral conflicts.
The user prefers to avoid nihilistic or morally bleak storylines.
The user prefers content aligned with their personal or moral values.
